description.oldValue:
While screen sharing, the presenter window now shows
up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), active speakers, and
raise hands. Meeting notifications are surfaced to the central area of the
screen for easier awareness and consistent windowing behavior.
description.newValue:
[This item is being postponed indefinitely.] While screen sharing, the presenter window now shows
up to four meeting participants (both video and audio), active speakers, and
raise hands. Meeting notifications are surfaced to the central area of the
screen for easier awareness and consistent windowing behavior.
